thread.title: Canaccord Genuity shares up as broker swings into black
thread.title_full: Canaccord Genuity shares up as broker swings into black

title: Canaccord Genuity shares up as broker swings into black
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Aug 5, 2015, 14:45 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 45 mins Canaccord Genuity shares up as broker swings into black By Victoria Young | Sharecast – 38 minutes ago 6.57 -0.140 
  Brokerage Canaccord Genuity delivered a profit in the first quarter of 2015, posting $11m up from last quarter's $26.3m loss. Shares (Berlin: DI6.BE - news ) in Canaccord were up 7.04% at 1218 BST to 380p despite the profit being 40% lower than the same quarter last year. 
Revenue was down to $214.5m, a decrease of 13% from $245.6m but the company said it focused on cutting costs. 
The company decreased expenses by 9% to $202.3m in the latest quarter from £222.3m in the final quarter of last year. Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
